com.adidas.ui.design.widget

Class DateInput

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.view.View
      • android.view.ViewGroup
        • android.widget.FrameLayout
          • com.adidas.ui.design.widget.InputLayout
            • com.adidas.ui.design.widget.DateInput
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.graphics.drawable.Drawable.Callback, android.view.accessibility.AccessibilityEventSource, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.ViewManager, android.view.ViewParent, DateProvider, NumericMaskedField.Listener

    public class DateInput
extends InputLayout
implements DateProvider, NumericMaskedField.Listener
    Date input component. Uses in focus, out of focus modes, validation and guidance animation provided by InputLayout. Guides set to this input should validate DateProvider, this is to do validation against each field's value.
